short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
